request: How is the Desmann smart door lock?
content:
Top 3 Recommended Smart Door Locks of 2024
Xiaomi Door Lock
Priced at 799 yuan, this door lock is highly cost-effective and considered a disruptor in the industry. It's the cheapest Xiaomi door lock to date. The product supports multiple unlocking methods and uses a C-level direct-insertion lock cylinder with a three-proof smart lock body, ensuring home security. The handle integrates a high-security 'integrated semiconductor fingerprint recognition module,' which can accurately identify fingerprint information. When pressing down the handle, the door can be unlocked simultaneously, with a fingerprint recognition rate of 99%, and it can recognize fingerprints within 0.5 seconds. The door lock also integrates a smart doorbell, which will ring on both the interior and exterior panels when a visitor presses the doorbell, and the Mijia App will send a notification to your smartphone. It also supports Xiaomi's smart ecosystem, allowing you to close smart appliances, turn off fans, and start the robot vacuum by pressing the defense button on the outer door lock panel when leaving home.
Qin General Smart Door Lock Q14
The Qin General Q14 is first noted for its affordable price, with many models priced under 1,000 yuan, yet it doesn't compromise on functionality. It supports fingerprint, password, key, and card unlocking, as well as remote smartphone unlocking. Qin General is a well-known brand in China, recognized for its reliable product quality and after-sales service. Both the lock body and panel are made of stainless steel, ensuring strong durability. The Qin General fingerprint lock uses imported chips and sensors to guarantee product stability and reliability. Additionally, it has anti-pry, anti-drill, and anti-technical unlocking features, enhancing the product's security.
Desmann V9
Desmann is a leading brand in the domestic smart lock industry, comparable to Kaadas, and has grown alongside the ten-year golden development period of smart locks in China. Desmann primarily uses chips imported from Germany and the United States in their products, and the V9 model is equipped with a German Hiyie high-definition fingerprint algorithm chip and world-leading ACAM protection technology. The Desmann V9 is a high-end model in their semi-automatic smart lock lineup and the only one with a visual peephole, making it a great choice for users with a sufficient budget.
